onboarding_1_content: Connect with friends and students in your area to exchange books, study materials, and other items.
onboarding_2_content: Save costs and reduce waste by exchanging used items instead of buying new ones.
onboarding_3_content: Post exchange listings and find the items you need in just a few simple steps.
welcome_desc: Please login to your account or create new account to continue
signup_question_1_desc: Enter your real name as you use it in daily life
signup_question_2_desc: Select the name of the school, college, or university you are currently attending or the nearest one to your location
signup_question_3: What is your date of birth?
signup_question_3_desc: Pick your birth date. You can change its visibility later.
signup_question_4_desc: Please select your gender from the options below
signup_question_5_email_desc: Please provide an email where we can contact you. This will remain private and won't be shown on your profile
signup_question_5_phone_desc: Please provide an phone number where we can contact you. This will remain private and won't be shown on your profile
signup_verify_desc_head: We sent you a 6 digit code to verify your {}
forgot_pw_desc: Enter your email address and we will share a link to create a new password
network_error: Unable to connect, please check your network
registration_age_limit: You must be {} years or older to register
password_length: Password should be at least 8 characters long
password_requirements: Password must contain at least one uppercase letter, one number, and one special character
confirm_send_otp: Are you sure you want to resend the OTP?
error_max_price: Maximum price must be greater than or equal to minimum price
